```{r,include=FALSE}
library(openMSE)
printDesc <- function(slot, class="Stock") {
  Desc <- get(paste0(class, "Description"))
  Desc$Description[which(Desc$Slot == slot)]
}
```

### Name
`r printDesc("Name")`

### Common_Name 
`r printDesc("Common_Name")`

### Species
`r printDesc("Species")`

### Source
`r printDesc("Source")`
